channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13224] Minor formatting issue when logging a namespace scope in AuthResult#toContextString
item.description:
Now that we handle namespace permissions AuthResult#toContextString is not correctly formatted:


Access denied for user esteban; reason: Insufficient permissions; remote address: /10.20.30.1; request: createTable; context: (user=esteban@XXX, scope=defaultaction=CREATE)
item.summary: Minor formatting issue when logging a namespace scope in AuthResult#toContextString

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
the patch is ok, but since you add the comma both in the if and in the else, you can do like the user does. and remove the comma inside the if (and avoid the else)


sb.append("scope=")

        .append(namespace != null ? namespace : table == null ? "GLOBAL" : table);

        .append(", ");

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12704303/0001-HBASE-13224-Minor-formatting-issue-when-logging-a-na.patch
against master branch at commit 3509cc21349cdc54d9aa22f5534207920e8100ff.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12704303

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.
